text: @toryboypierce @COVID19 @MattHancock The supreme target is 250K tests a day, set by @BorisJohnson, without a deadline. @MattHancock's sub target 100K tests by end April deadline was simply a tool to gee up the national effort to help achieve the PM's target. Nothing more than that and should not be treated as such
